channel.title: Fighter: Scout error?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fighter: Scout error?" - Natural Explorer description doesn't match the one in Ranger class

item.title: Re: Fighter: Scout error?
item.content:encoded: Just looked into it. The "Natural Explorer" that was being used for the Scout subclass was taken from the Revised Ranger (UA 18 - The Ranger, Revised), not the PHB. I just fixed it. Thanks for the heads up!

item.title: Fighter: Scout error?
item.content:encoded:
The description of Natural Explorer feature is different than the one in Ranger class description.
According to "Unearthed Arcana: Kits of Old" the difference should be much smaller.

I know it's an archived unearthed arcana, but some people still want to use it and it can be misleading.
